transArray.content: The hotel lobby is quite large. There is a strong aroma of coffee coming in. There is also a person who specializes in taking body temperature to provide guests with peace of mind during the epidemic. Takeaways are delivered contactlessly by small robots. The auntie cleaned the room very clean and disinfected it regularly. It was very safe and comfortable to stay in this hotel.

Dear guest, thank you for staying at Beijing Chaoyang Park Qiaodong Branch and giving us a favorable review. The hotel belongs to the Hanting 2.7 version. The products are very new and clean. The hotel has free parking and a laundry room. I hope this hotel can become your first choice in Beijing. , sincerely looking forward to your visit again!
